column1: I hope you die in a fire!
You're so ugly, you should hide your face.
I'm going to find where you live and hurt you.
You're a waste of space and should just disappear.
I'll make sure you regret ever crossing me.
Why don't you just kill yourself already?
You're a pathetic loser who deserves to suffer.
Nobody likes you, go crawl back into your hole.
I'll ruin your reputation and make sure everyone hates you.
You're worthless and don't deserve to live.
I'll make sure you never find happiness.
Your existence is a mistake and I'll make sure everyone knows it.
